TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit RangeValuePattern/RangeValuePatternInformation extends System.ValueType

summary.span: Proporciona acceso a los valores de propiedades de un objeto mediante sus descriptores de acceso o .

span.span: Provides access to the property values of a object using its or accessors.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool IsReadOnly { get; }
.property instance bool IsReadOnly
Public ReadOnly Property IsReadOnly As Boolean
public: property bool IsReadOnly { bool get(); };

summary.span: Obtiene un valor que especifica si el valor de un elemento [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] es de solo lectura.

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the value of a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element is read-only.

value.span: si el valor es de solo lectura; si se puede modificar.

span.span: if the value is read-only; if it can be modified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Un control debe tener su establecido en `true` y su establecido en `false` antes de la creación de un objeto.A control should have its set to `true` and its set to `false` prior to the creation of a object. ## Examples En el ejemplo siguiente, un que admita la patrón de control tiene su valor aumenta o disminuye por específico del control valor.In the following example, an that supports the control pattern has its value incremented or decremented by the control-specific value. [!code-csharp[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#103LargeChange](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/CSharp/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.cs#103largechange)] [!code-vb[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#103LargeChange](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.vb#103largechange)] [!code-csharp[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/CSharp/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.vb#103)] [!code-csharp[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/CSharp/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.vb#101)]

summary.span: Obtiene el valor de cambio grande específico del control que se suma o se resta a la propiedad .

span.span: Gets the control-specific large-change value which is added to or subtracted from the property.

value.span: Valor de cambio grande o si el elemento no admite .

span.span: The large-change value or if the element does not support .

remarks.format: ## Examples En el ejemplo siguiente, un que admita la patrón de control tiene su valor aumenta o disminuye por específico del control valor.In the following example, an that supports the control pattern has its value incremented or decremented by the control-specific value. summary.span: Obtiene el valor máximo del intervalo que el elemento [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] admite.

span.span: Gets the maximum range value supported by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element.

value.span: El valor máximo admitido por el [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elemento o si el elemento no admite .

span.span: The maximum value supported by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element or if the element does not support .

remarks.format: ## Examples En el ejemplo siguiente, un que admite el patrón de control tiene su valor establecido en el valor máximo específico del control.In the following example, an that supports the control pattern has its value set to the control-specific maximum value. [!code-csharp[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#104Maximum](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/CSharp/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.cs#104maximum)] [!code-vb[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#104Maximum](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.vb#104maximum)] [!code-csharp[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/CSharp/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.cs#104)] [!code-vb[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.vb#104)] [!code-csharp[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/CSharp/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.vb#101)]

summary.span: Obtiene el valor de cambio pequeño, único para el elemento de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)], que se suma a la propiedad de los elementos o se resta de ella.

span.span: Gets the small-change value, unique to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element, which is added to or subtracted from the elements property.

value.span: El valor de cambio pequeño único para la [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elemento o si el elemento no admite .

span.span: The small-change value unique to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element or if the element does not support .

summary.span: Obtiene el valor actual del elemento de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Examples En el ejemplo siguiente, un objeto obtenido de un control de destino se pasa a una función que recupera actual valores de propiedad.In the following example, a object obtained from a target control is passed into a function that retrieves the current property values. [!code-csharp[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/CSharp/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.vb#102)]
